name: RattleTide: Flyer Go Boom
description:
Controls:

  • Mouse X - Roll
  • Mouse Y - Pitch
  • "W" -  Pitch down
  • "D" - Pitch up
  • "A" - Left
  • "D" - Right
  • Left Shift - Thrust (While Held)

Summary:

Fly over the open ocean and through the markers to progress but why not explore under the water's surface and above the clouds.

Note: This was made for the game jam (Week 161) and this may be taken further as a game.
